channel.title: My Old Account :)
channel.description:
Recently I decided to dig up my old account. Its been 8 years since I played the account. Check out my newb bank from when I played rsc (yes I was a member). When RS2 came out I decided to stay back and play rsc. Since I lost my password and it took jagex 8 years to spit out my account...
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/804/bankk.jpg/][IMG]http://img804.imageshack.us/img804/2232/bankk.jpg[/img][/URL]
Here are my beast stats.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/847/statsyu.jpg/][IMG]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/3107/statsyu.jpg[/img][/URL]
Some things I remember about the account... Mining was my life. It was the way to become rich in rsc. I was just short of the mining guild :( (OR NO I WASN'T! I drank that one drink to get in :) ) I didn't train smithing as much as I sold my ore to my cousin so he could smith mith plates. I remember cooking meat in lumby till 30 cooking.. The 3 addy ore I picked up at a drop party and one was given to me by "omart75" My r2h.. cost me 60 coal certs. Sad to say I gave away my santa hats. As I held onto 6 of them (maybe I will still have them if I log into rsc?)

item.title: My Old Account :)
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Just recovered this!!! I don’t remember logging onto it one year ago, the last I remember playing this account is 2007.
Anyway, here you go. I really liked black (g)

b96kck.png1598×961

2ed427k.png799×600

It had Black (g) and 1.4m in cash.

Read full topic

item.title: My Old Account :)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:19, topic:409244”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=510527.msg3707976#msg3707976 date=1313167265]

Seeing all these old accounts makes me want to recover my 04 accounts. They always got hacked because I fell for that stupid scam that was all over the internet. (Looking back at it I really don’t understand how I could have been that stupid!). It was all over Cheat Planet and I kept doing it over and over and over again until I got sick of getting hacked on Runescape and quit. The scam was just like this:

How to hack runescape accounts! Send an email to JaGeX’s recovery email, JagexRecover@yahoo.com, that looks just like this… jfkasdlkjfls"Your username"kjdjdjdjahsdfk"Victims Username"@@@#@@#@@“Your password"LLKLKLKLK"Victims new password”. Then sign into the account and the password will be changed!

Ahh what a noob I was.

Remember the fake sites where you would put in your username and password and then a box for any free items you want?? Aha… so gullible. They never hacked my account though.

…

9otHW.jpg1001×639

[/quote]
:)[/quote]

lol! I never fell for those ones.

Read full topic

item.title: My Old Account :)
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Fridder:

3 diamonds… Free gem cutting or what?

Power Amulets were 20k at the time. Also I am rocking this account now. Transferred over some gp and got the bank organized. Time to go legit. Will make it a member when I feel like its the right time. As for my skills… in rsc it was necessary to train your skills “together”.

Read full topic

item.title: My Old Account :)
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:409244”]ahh… I see a rune med in your bank…

Remember going to karjama, fishing your food, begging for a fire (one asshole always charged for fires), finally you get one, burn half your food, then go into the pit just for the hope that you’ll get that 12k rune med drop, then sell it to someone who will alch it for 12.5k[/quote]
IKR!

Read full topic

item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Recently I decided to dig up my old account. Its been 8 years since I played the account. Check out my newb bank from when I played rsc (yes I was a member). When RS2 came out I decided to stay back and play rsc. Since I lost my password and it took jagex 8 years to spit out my account…

Here are my beast stats.

Some things I remember about the account…
Mining was my life. It was the way to become rich in rsc. I was just short of the mining guild (OR NO I WASN’T! I drank that one drink to get in )
I didn’t train smithing as much as I sold my ore to my cousin so he could smith mith plates.
I remember cooking meat in lumby till 30 cooking…
The 3 addy ore I picked up at a drop party and one was given to me by “omart75”
My r2h… cost me 60 coal certs.
Sad to say I gave away my santa hats. As I held onto 6 of them (maybe I will still have them if I log into rsc?)
